name: Zagara
title: Broodmother of the Swarm
description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

abilities.name: Baneling Barrage
abilities.description: Launch 1 Baneling that deals 86 damage to enemies it hits. Stores up to 4 charges.

abilities.name: Hunter Killer
abilities.description: Summon a Hydralisk to attack a single target, dealing 68 damage per second. Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Infested Drop
abilities.description: Bombard target area with a Zerg Drop Pod for 147 damage. The pod spawns 2 Roachlings that deal 29 damage per second and last for 8 seconds.

heroics.name: Devouring Maw
heroics.description: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 80 damage per second. Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

heroics.name: Nydus Network
heroics.description: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second. Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 10 Nydus Worms at a time. Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther. Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by .75 seconds.
